pages.title: Upgrade Tool
pages.text: The $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Upgrade-Tool)Upgrade Tool/$ when Right Clicked on an upgraded pedestal, will display details about the upgrade, to you in the chat.$(br)when Shift-Right Clicking on a pedestal it'll save a pedestals location (Like the linking tool) but it will only show you the work area or effected block of that upgrade(may not work on all upgrades)
